description: A revolutionary force led by Monkey D. Dragon that opposes the World Government. Emporio Ivankov is revealed to be a commander in the organization, leading the G Army.

keyMoments.description: Emporio Ivankov, a Revolutionary Army commander, is introduced in Impel Down's secret Level 5.5.
keyMoments.significance: First direct involvement of a Revolutionary Army commander in Luffy's journey, establishing connections that will become important later.

reveals.information: Emporio Ivankov serves as a commander of the Revolutionary Army's G Army
Inazuma serves as deputy commander under Ivankov in the Revolutionary Army
